com.forgerock.opendj.cli

Class CommandBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.forgerock.opendj.cli.CommandBuilder

  • public class CommandBuilder
extends Object
    Class used to be able to generate the non interactive mode.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String HTML_LINE_SEPARATOR
      The separator used to link the lines of the resulting command-lines in HTML format.
      static String LINE_SEPARATOR
      The separator used to link the lines of the resulting command-lines.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      Creates a CommandBuilder with null command and subcommand names.

      The constructor for the CommandBuilder.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addArgument(Argument argument)
      Adds an argument to the list of the command builder.
      void addObfuscatedArgument(Argument argument)
      Adds an argument whose values must be obfuscated (passwords for instance).
      void append(CommandBuilder builder)
      Appends the arguments of another command builder to this command builder.
      void clearArguments()
      Clears the arguments.
      static String escapeValue(String value)
      This method simply takes a value and tries to transform it (with escape or '"') characters so that it can be used in a command line.

      Returns the list of arguments.

      Tells whether the provided argument's values must be obfuscated or not.

      Removes the provided arguments from this CommandBuilder.
      String toString()
      Returns the String representation of this command builder (i.e. what we want to show to the user).

      Returns the String representation of this command builder (i.e. what we want to show to the user).

        Returns:
        true if the attribute was present and removed and false otherwise.

      • removeArguments

        public void removeArguments(Argument... arguments)
        Removes the provided arguments from this CommandBuilder. Arguments which are not in this CommandBuilder will be ignored.
        Parameters:
        arguments - Arguments to be removed.

      • escapeValue

        public static String escapeValue(String value)
        This method simply takes a value and tries to transform it (with escape or '"') characters so that it can be used in a command line.
        Parameters:
        value - The String to be treated.
        Returns:
        The transformed value.
